pages.text: Saiyaku ga hitobito o nayamasu toki kare-ra wa kaigo shite omoni inoru. Daga kare ga, jihi o kare-ra ni aji wa seru to, tachimachi ichibu no mono wa omoni (soto no kamigami o) haishi
ware ga ataeta mono o arigataku omowanai yo ni naru. (Wazuka no nengetsu o) kyoraku suruga i.Daga yagate wakarudearou
Ware ni hai shite iru mono o shiji suru ken'i o, ware ga kare-ra ni kudashita to demo iu no ka
Ware ga ningen ni jihi o aji wa seru to, kare-ra wa sore ni kyoki suru. Daga jibun no okonai no tame ni saiyaku ga kudaru to, tachimachi, kare-ra wa zetsubo suru
Kare-ra wa minai no ka, arra ga o nozomi no mono ni, kate o mashi, mata herashi nasa reru no o. Hontoni sono nakaniha, shinko suru mono e no shirushi ga aru
Sore de kinshin no mono ni, shikarubeki mono o atae yo. Mata hinja to tabibito ni mo. Sore wa, arra no jigan o motomeru-sha-tachi ni tori, mottomo yoi kotodearu. Korera wa, sakaeru-sha-tachidearu
Anata gataga rishoku no tame ni, kori de hito ni kashi ataete mo, arra no motode wa, nani mo fuenai. Daga arra no jigan o motomete kisha suru mono ni wa hosho ga zoka sa reru

Arra koso wa, anata gata o tsukuri, fuyo sa re, tsuide shina se, sarani yomigaera se rareru katadearu. Anata gataga (netsuzo shikare ni) hai shita mono no naka, korera no koto no hitotsu demo dekiru mono ga aru ka. Kare ni tatae are. Kare hakare-ra ga haisuru mono no ue ni takaku ora reru
Ningen no te ga kaseida koto no tame ni, riku ni umi ni kohai ga mo arawarete iru. Kore wa (arra ga), kare-ra no okonatta koto no ichibu o ajiwawa se kare-ra o (aku kara) modora seru tamedearu
